member.name: M:Presentation.Controllers.EmailController.GetWebinar(System.Guid,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Gets the emailId with the specified identifier, if it exists.
member.returns: The email with the specified identifier, if it exists.

member.name: M:Presentation.Controllers.EmailController.CreateWebinar(Application.Email.Commands.CreateEmail.CreateEmailRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Creates a new email based on the specified request.
member.returns: The identifier of the newly created email.
